description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Wings With Chilli, Chive And Lime Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken Wings With Chilli, Chive And Lime Butter
name: Chicken Wings With Chilli, Chive And Lime Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Remove wings from marinade and place on prepared tray. Bake, basting every 15 minutes, for 45 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Top with slices of chilli, chive and lime butter. Serve with lime wedges.
